mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO, PRODUCT_TB_NAME, PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_TB_DETAIL FROM product
SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO, PRODUCT_TB_NAME, PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_TB_DETAIL FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_TB_CODE=#{productTbCode}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO, p.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, p.PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE, p.PRODUCT_TB_DETAIL, pc.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_PARENT, pc.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_MEDIAN, pc.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_SUB, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pd_image pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_TB_CODE ) "product_image_count", ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pd_sale ps WHERE p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = ps.PRODUCT_TB_CODE ) "product_sale_count" FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO = pc.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO WHERE PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT ps.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO FROM( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE FROM pd_sale WHERE PD_SALE_TB_STATE = 'Y' GROUP BY PRODUCT_TB_CODE) ps JOIN product p ON ps.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE WHERE p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO = #{productCategoryTbNo})

SELECT p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, p.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, p.PRODUCT_TB_DETAIL, ps.PD_SALE_TB_RATING FROM product p JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PD_SALE_TB_RATING FROM pd_sale WHERE PRODUCT_TB_CODE=#{productTbCode} AND ROWNUM=1 ) ps ON p.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = ps.PRODUCT_TB_CODE
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PD_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PI.PRODUCT_TB_CODE WHERE PRODUCT_TB_BANNER_STATE = 'Y' AND PD_IMAGE_TB_REPRESENTATIVE = 'Y'

SELECT X.* FROM( SELECT B.*, C.ORDERS_DETAIL_TB_AMOUNT FROM( SELECT A.*, PS.PD_SALE_TB_NO FROM( SELECT P.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, P.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, MAX(PI.PD_IMAGE_TB_PATH) "PD_IMAGE_TB_PATH" FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PD_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PI.PRODUCT_TB_CODE GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_TB_CODE,P.PRODUCT_TB_NAME) A JOIN PD_SALE PS ON A.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PS.PRODUCT_TB_CODE) B JOIN ( SELECT OD.PD_SALE_TB_NO, SUM(OD.ORDERS_DETAIL_TB_AMOUNT) "ORDERS_DETAIL_TB_AMOUNT" FROM ORDERS_DETAIL OD JOIN PD_ORDER PO ON OD.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = PO.PD_ORDER_TB_NO WHERE PO.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo} GROUP BY OD.PD_SALE_TB_NO) C ON B.PD_SALE_TB_NO = C.PD_SALE_TB_NO ORDER BY ORDERS_DETAIL_TB_AMOUNT DESC) X
WHERE ROWNUM <=4

SELECT H.*, I.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_PARENT, I.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_MEDIAN, I.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_SUB FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, F.*, G.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO, G.PRODUCT_TB_NAME FROM( SELECT D.*, E.PD_SALE_TB_READ_COUNT, ROUND(E.PD_SALE_TB_READ_COUNT/D.OD_CNT, 2) "RO" FROM( SELECT C.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, SUM(C.OD_CNT) "OD_CNT" FROM( SELECT A.*, B.PRODUCT_TB_CODE FROM( SELECT X.PD_SALE_TB_NO, COUNT(*) "OD_CNT" FROM ORDERS_DETAIL X JOIN PD_ORDER Y ON X.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = Y.PD_ORDER_TB_NO WHERE (Y.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo}) AND PD_ORDER_TB_STATE IN ('P', 'D', 'A') GROUP BY X.PD_SALE_TB_NO) A JOIN PD_SALE B ON A.PD_SALE_TB_NO = B.PD_SALE_TB_NO) C GROUP BY C.PRODUCT_TB_CODE) D JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PD_SALE_TB_READ_COUNT FROM PD_SALE GROUP BY PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PD_SALE_TB_READ_COUNT) E ON D.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = E.PRODUCT_TB_CODE WHERE OD_CNT > 0 ORDER BY RO) F JOIN PRODUCT G ON F.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = G.PRODUCT_TB_CODE) H JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY I ON H.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO = I.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, C.* FROM( SELECT B.*, PDT.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO, PDT.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_PARENT, PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_MEDIAN, PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_SUB FROM( SELECT A.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, COUNT(*) "CANCEL_CNT" FROM( SELECT PO.PD_ORDER_TB_NO, OD.PD_SALE_TB_NO, PS.PRODUCT_TB_CODE FROM PD_ORDER PO JOIN ORDERS_DETAIL OD ON PO.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = OD.PD_ORDER_TB_NO JOIN PD_SALE PS ON OD.PD_SALE_TB_NO = PS.PD_SALE_TB_NO WHERE PO.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE = 'C' AND PO.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo}) A GROUP BY PRODUCT_TB_CODE) B JOIN PRODUCT PDT ON B.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PDT.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON PDT.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO = PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB_NO ORDER BY CANCEL_CNT DESC) C

SELECT E.*, F.PD_SALE_TB_NO, G.PD_SALE_TB_SALES_PRICE, G.PD_SALE_TB_DISCOUNT_RATE, G.PD_SALE_TB_SIZE FROM( SELECT D.* FROM( SELECT B.*, PDT.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, PDT.PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE, C.PD_IMAGE_TB_PATH FROM( SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_STATE = 'Y') A GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_TB_CODE) B JOIN PRODUCT PDT ON B.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PDT.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN (SELECT * FROM PD_IMAGE WHERE PD_IMAGE_TB_REPRESENTATIVE = 'Y') C ON PDT.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = C.PRODUCT_TB_CODE ORDER BY PDT.PRODUCT_TB_REG_DATE DESC) D WHERE ROWNUM <= 4) E JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, MIN(PD_SALE_TB_NO) "PD_SALE_TB_NO" FROM PD_SALE GROUP BY PRODUCT_TB_CODE ) F ON E.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = F.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN PD_SALE G ON F.PD_SALE_TB_NO = G.PD_SALE_TB_NO

SELECT F.* FROM( SELECT B.*, PDT.PRODUCT_TB_NAME, C.PD_IMAGE_TB_PATH, D.PD_SALE_TB_NO, E.PD_SALE_TB_SALES_PRICE, E.PD_SALE_TB_DISCOUNT_RATE, E.PD_SALE_TB_SIZE FROM( SELECT PS.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, SUM(A.ORDER_CNT) "ORDER_CNT" FROM( SELECT PD_SALE_TB_NO, COUNT(*) "ORDER_CNT" FROM ORDERS_DETAIL OD JOIN PD_ORDER PO ON OD.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = PO.PD_ORDER_TB_NO WHERE PO.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE IN ('P', 'D', 'A') GROUP BY PD_SALE_TB_NO) A JOIN PD_SALE PS ON A.PD_SALE_TB_NO = PS.PD_SALE_TB_NO GROUP BY PS.PRODUCT_TB_CODE) B JOIN PRODUCT PDT ON B.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = PDT.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN (SELECT * FROM PD_IMAGE WHERE PD_IMAGE_TB_REPRESENTATIVE = 'Y') C ON PDT.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = C.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_TB_CODE, MIN(PD_SALE_TB_NO) "PD_SALE_TB_NO" FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_STATE = 'Y' GROUP BY PRODUCT_TB_CODE ) D ON B.PRODUCT_TB_CODE = D.PRODUCT_TB_CODE JOIN PD_SALE E ON D.PD_SALE_TB_NO = E.PD_SALE_TB_NO ORDER BY B.ORDER_CNT DESC) F WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
